sentences.english: About 20 percent of the vaccine will be reserved for essential workers and the rest go to the public on a voluntary basis.
sentences.chinese: 有20%的疫苗将供收储，其馀面向公众自愿接种。

sentences.english: Voluntary workers built a road to the boy's camp.
sentences.chinese: 自愿的工人建了一条路，通到男孩子们的营地。

sentences.english: Banks are not lining up to lend money on their own for construction of the newest generation of Indian Points.
sentences.chinese: 银行不会自愿贷款给新一代印点核电站的建造。

sentences.english: Trade certification is available, but voluntary, in Québec.
sentences.chinese: 在魁北克省行业认证是可用的，但是自愿的。

sentences.english: Paradoxically, the principle of voluntary join caused a low attendance of farmers.
sentences.chinese: 农村合作医疗参保率与农民自愿参加的矛盾。

sentences.english: Finally, it should realize the willing assignment of national sovereignty on the trans-frontier pollution issue.
sentences.chinese: 最后需要在越境污染问题上国家主权权力的自愿让渡。

sentences.english: The emperor abdicated in favor of his son.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝自愿退位，由他的儿子登基。

sentences.english: Market is voluntary cooperation of people. A gives something to B and B gives something to A.
sentences.chinese: 市场交易的本质是人与人的自愿合作。

sentences.english: She volunteered for a dangerous mission.
sentences.chinese: 她自愿参加一项危险的任务。

sentences.english: The Club is entirely voluntarily run and is non political.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部是一个全部自愿管理的非政治性组织。

sentences.english: All the regulations above are known clearly by me, and I am voluntary to observe them.
sentences.chinese: 本人已详知以上有关规定和安全提示并自愿遵守。

sentences.english: Many men including Jamb volunteered to help.
sentences.chinese: 许多人包括杰可伯都自愿帮忙。

sentences.english: They are classic members - honorary members by definition - of China's new people's army of volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 他们是一群精英，是新“中国人民自愿军”志愿者。

sentences.english: An ISFP may find great satisfaction from volunteering as a counselor .
sentences.chinese: 在自愿充当顾问时，ISFP会得到极大的满足感。

sentences.english: The university claims that no-one was forced to use the hat, but they all chose to do so.
sentences.chinese: 学校声明大家都是自愿使用这种帽子的。

sentences.english: Trade certification for automotive machinists is available, but voluntary, in Ontario.
sentences.chinese: 在安大略省汽车机械师行业认证可用，但是自愿的，。

definition: to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to know the facts/to understand/to be familiar with the situation
to fulfill one's duty/to work without asking for reward
